ComicInfo.Title: The Empty City; The Quiet Men; Nothing Can Stop Me; The Thing That Waited!; A Shriek in the Night!
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Empty City: A reporter stumbles upon aliens who are taking the place of humans. He tries to give the story to his editor, but his editor is one of...them.
The Quiet Men: Martians encounter a 'ghost ship' from Earth which is a bomber responsible for dropping the bomb that initiated an atomic holocaust on Earth.
Nothing Can Stop Me: A weak man takes an experimental strength serum derived from a gorilla to impress a girl, but it transforms him into a gorilla completely.
The Thing That Waited!: Stalin and Soviet troops stand revealed as shape-shifting alien invaders.
A Shriek in the Night!: A man becomes the victim of underground creatures who abduct humans in order to study them so as to prepare for an invasion.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bob Fujitani,Harry Lazarus,Bill Walton,Joe Maneely,Werner Roth,Bob Fujitani,Harry Lazarus,Bill Walton,Joe Maneely,Werner Roth
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Fujitani,Harry Lazarus,Bill Walton,Joe Maneely,Werner Roth,Bob Fujitani,Harry Lazarus,Bill Walton,Joe Maneely,Werner Roth
